name: inspirer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who makes someone feel that they want to do something and can do it: a great leader and inspirer of people The winning teachers were described as tireless inspirers who had won cash for their schools.
someone or something that causes a particular strong feeling or reaction: Their condition should be the inspirer of pity, not envy. See
inspire
More examplesFewer examplesThey have named him as the organizer and inspirer of this robbery.She was one of the most remarkable inspirers of her time.John Ruskin was the great inspirer of pre-Raphaelite paintingHe sounds like a merchant of gloom rather than an inspirer of confidence.
